name: modules-quickstart-template
description: Developer template to create a module.

scripts.//preinstall: echo Initializes node within the react-wrapper. Ran automatically during npm install
scripts.//build: echo Transpiles files (tsc), copies view code into the 'dist' folder, then exports the module into .modules_dev
scripts.build: tsc && node copyFiles.js --submodule && npm run dev_export
scripts.//export: echo Builds react-wrapper and exports module for production.
scripts.//dev_export: echo Quick-export module during development. However, since the react-wrapper is ran via webserver, we don't need to build that.
scripts.//vite-build: echo Builds react-wrapper to a single html file within /react_module/
scripts.//start-vite: echo Starts the react-wrapper webserver, usually on http://localhost:5173/
scripts.//react-start: echo Starts webserver and initializes electron.

author: aarontburn
